summary: A collection of unit tests that verify the Elasticache mock implementation, covering creation and deletion of Memcached and Redis clusters, user account management with password policies, description of clusters and users, tag listing, and proper error handling for duplicate or unknown resources, along with tests for the mock server's API endpoints.
business_intent: Ensure the Elasticache mock reliably emulates AWS Elasticache behavior so developers can run integration tests and CI pipelines without accessing real AWS resources.
